title: BUG
body: My league client has no issue with logging in but if I try to login with a new account (one without a ingame name set) the client would bugsplat, any other account that already has a ingame name is fine. Any fixes?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you tried [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)? let me know if this helps.
